Name: Power Attack
Trigger: you hit with a Weapon attack
Target: targets an enemy hit by the triggering attack
EffectPost: Against the target, the triggering attack deals an extra 1W and gains Push 1.
Upgrades:
Upgrade 13: Increase extra damage to 2W
Upgrade 23: Increase extra damage to 3W

Name: Empower Spell
Trigger: you hit with an Implement attack
Target: targets an enemy hit by the triggering attack
EffectPost: Against the target, the triggering attack deals an extra 1d10 and gains Push 1.
Upgrades:
Upgrade 13: Increase extra damage to 2d10
Upgrade 23: Increase extra damage to 3d10

Name: Offensive Training
EffectPost: Until you recharge or retrain this power, your attacks gain +1 Miss Damage.
Upgrades:
Upgrade 5: Your attacks gain +1 damage and +1 Miss Damage.
Upgrade 15: Your attacks gain +1 damage and +2 Miss Damage.
Upgrade 25: Your attacks gain +2 damage and +2 Miss Damage.

Name: Defensive Training
EffectPost: Until you recharge or retrain this power, you gain +3 HP.
Upgrades:
Upgrade 5: +4 HP
Upgrade 15: +6 HP
Upgrade 25: +9 HP

Name: Shield Bash
Hit: 1W+Str. Push 1, and you may shift that distance to a square adjacent to the target.

Name: Cleave
SecondaryAttack:
Melee, targets another enemy, Str vs AC
Hit: Str.

Name: Hamstring
Hit: 2W + Str, and Slowed (save ends). Until your next turn, the target has -Wis to save while adjacent to you.
Upgrades:
Upgrade 13: Increase Hit damage to 3W+Str
Upgrade 23: Increase Hit damage to 4W+Str

Name: Stunning Strike
Hit: Hit: 1W, and Stunned until your next turn.
Upgrades:
Upgrade 13: Increase Hit damage to 2W
Upgrade 23: Increase Hit damage to 3W

Name: Storm of blades
Upgrades:
Upgrade 13: Increase Hit damage to 2W
Upgrade 23: Increase Hit damage to 3W

Name: Brutal Strike
Upgrades:
Upgrade 15: Increase Hit damage to 5W+Str
Upgrade 25: Increase Hit damage to 7W+Str

Name: Comeback Strike
EffectPost: Spend a surge and double the amount healed.
Upgrades:
Upgrade 15: Increase Hit damage to 3W+Str
Upgrade 25: Increase Hit damage to 4W+Str

Name: Blade Dance
EffectPost: Use Total Defense. Stance: At the start of your turn, deal 1(W) and Slide 1 to one adjacent enemy.
Upgrades:
Upgrade 15: Effect Deal 1W and Slide 1 to each adjacent enemy.
Upgrade 25: Deal 2W and Slide 1 to each adjacent enemy.

Name: Shield Wall
EffectPost: Until your next turn, you gain Cover against enemy attacks and cannot be flanked.

Name: Grit
EffectPost: Roll a save to ignore one Combat Condition this turn. On a failed save, lose 1 Surge.

Name: Find Opening
EffectPost: Until end of your next turn, your attacks against the target gain Advantage and Pierce Resist

Name: Arcane Missiles
Target: targets up to 3 enemies within 2 of each other
Summary: Low damage and push to 3 targets

Name: Healing Word
EffectPost: The target spends a Surge, and heals +1d6

Name: Healing Light
Hit: 1d8 Radiant, and you or an ally within 2 of you heal Wis
